      • recieveShot

        public static java.lang.String recieveShot(java.lang.String shot,
                                           Grid grid)
        Recieve the shoot by opponent, encoded as String(row, col)
        Parameters:
        shot: - the string type of shot row and col, format: "row, col"
        grid: - my grid, use for checking miss or target
        Returns:
        "Invalid" if the format or number is invalid, "Miss" if no shot, "Target" if get shot at a ship

      • decodeShip

        public static Ship decodeShip(java.lang.String shipInfo)
        Decode the ship and create a clone ship by information provided encoded as "Destroy, " + type + ", " + row + ", " + col + ", " + dir;
        Parameters:
        shipInfo: - the information of the ship
        Returns:
        a clone ship of the opponent's
